nodes.bodyText:
pls, move this line near the place where it is first used.
Also, not sure if it would bring any benefit, but this value can be calculated once on construction time instead of each time on render().
also, instead of activeLocale={key, caption}, IMHO just sending the language name would be enough (i.e. activeLocale.key).
I think this was == null because it's a falsy value check, and not a strict comparison. So worth checking what clearValue can be called with to be sure it's ok to make this change.
